Reviews.Title: A fast, great product. Wow Touchscreen is awesome
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This is replacing my HP Laptop that is 5 years old. Although I am not fond ofWindows 8 the touchscreen was a must to me. The HD display is everything itis supposed to be. The only complaint is the flexibility of the left side of the keyboard, but I can live with that for a trade off.Windows 8 is going to release 8.1 in October and I believe it will be an update. This will no doubt improvefunctionality of windows 8. Like a start button and booting into desktop mode. Can't wait.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4GHz Quad Core Intel Core i7 Haswell CPU, Windows 8  64
17.3 inch Touch Screen LED-backlit display, 1920-by-1080 resolution
2TB (2048GB) via Dual Hard Drives, 16GB DDR3L RAM, WiFi-N 2x2
2GB (2048MB) NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M Dedicated Graphics, HDMI
Backlit Keyboard, Beats Audio, 4 USB 3.0 Ports, 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 17t-j000 Quad Edition Notebook PC (FULL HD Touch Screen, 2TB DUAL HD, 16GB DDR3L RAM)
